steps_cn: 1. Dice chicken breast and blanch; 2. Steam pumpkin and mash; 3. Add water to pot, simmer until soft; 4. Turn off heat, add nutrition powder and mix well, cool before feeding.
cautions_cn: Do not add salt, oil, onions, scallions, garlic, chocolate, grapes, xylitol or other forbidden ingredients.

steps_cn: 1. Rinse and cook quinoa; 2. Remove skin and bones from salmon, steam; 3. Cut carrot and broccoli into small pieces, blanch; 4. Mix well and cool.
cautions_cn: Avoid bones and spines; feed small amounts initially to observe digestive reaction.
